column4: i have a question: i backed up my windos partition to my external usb HD. then reformated the entire laptop HD and installed Ubuntu. now i want to switch back and restore all of my files. how do i copy the partition over from the removable HD to my normal HD, which is now NTFS formatted
qwerty how do i use dd?
That lets you browse dd's help file.
thanks for clearing that up, i might be able to figure that out
